text:
cent of the head 
o perform ventouse delivery if the head is 0/5 palpable above the brim. Transfer from CHC to hospital if 
skills and equipment are not available for ventouse delivery, or if the fetal head is ≥1/5 palpable (can 
attempt to do ventouse in hospital with 1/5 palpable head. 
• At hospital: allows for 2 hours of pushing for primigravida and 1 hour for multigravida if fetal and maternal 
condition stable 
Vacuum extraction/ ventouse delivery 
• Vacuum extraction (ventouse delivery) m
